data.title: Hot off the Net
data.text:
From the streets to the studio: Homeless Man, Golden Voice

7 January 2011 CBS Reports on a homeless man who has shot to fame for his great voice. If the link doesn't work, click this one.

TV aces added to the Mix

4 January 2011 This year sees a concerted campaign to regain lost ground for Mix 106.5 reports the Herald. .

95.5FM less family-friendly with Twitter tirade against 4BC

20 December 2010 STAFF at "family friendly" 96.5FM weren't holding back on their thoughts about rival stations yesterday. .

Fomer radio announcer sentenced for grooming 14-year-old

18 December 2010 A former 4BC and 2WS radio announcer has been convicted in child sex charges. .

Angela Clark launches hyper-local media play

16 December 2010 Former Macquarie Radio Network CEO Angela Clark has emerged at the helm of a hyper-local news site called Streetcorner and a new map-based spin-off, reports...

Ugly Phil to the rescue at 96FM

16 December 2010 "Ugly Phil" will join Brad "Fitzy" Fitzgerald at the helm of 96FM's breakfast show, reports WA Today. .

Brad McNally gets Ugly Phil as replacement

16 December 2010 96FM Program Director Brad 'The Ninja' McNally has replaced veteran announcer Gary Shannon with Ugly Phil, reports Perth Now (quoting radioinfo at one point). .

Megan Gale calls the shots in breakup with Andy Lee

16 December 2010 Megan Gale and Andy Lee have broken up. The Daily Telegraph reports that friends of the model say that, at 35, Gale feels she has...

Jon Coleman returns to UK radio

16 December 2010 Former Virgin Radio and Heart presenter Jono Coleman will be back on UK radio this Christmas with a special syndicated show, reports the UK's RadioToday...

Triple M takes a double hit: ratings and lawsuit

15 December 2010 If it wasn't bad enough at Triple M breakfast headquarters with Ali Carle, Dale Lewis and Warren Tredrea shedding the most listeners across ...

Derryn Hinch: Op gives me more time… yeeeesssss

15 December 2010 Derryn Hinch talks about success with his liver cancer and his ratings in his blog. .

Deano’s rogue radio show springs a leak

15 December 2010 When Nova funnyman Dean "Deano" Thomas's boss woke unexpectedly at 3am one night, and heard the Beatles playing on his station, he was ...

The most played song on Australian radio is Hey Soul Sister

15 December 2010 The most played track on Australian radio this year, according to the monitoring service at music industry publication The Music Network, was Hey, Soul Sister...

Nielsen Pulls Plug on Radio Ratings in US

14 December 2010 Arbitron can rest a little easier today, with the surprise announcement from Nielsen Co. that it is shutting down its nascent radio ratings service.

Audience number crunchers ask for more

12 December 2010 AUSTRALIAN advertisers want to tackle measurement problems for online, radio and print audiences next year, as well as self-regulation for targeted online ads. .

Radio National neat fit for geek comic

12 December 2010 "All comedians are basically nerds," Morrow says. "I spent most of my uncool teens and 20s listening to Radio National and NewsRadio.

Stan Zemanek’s wife diagnosed with cancer

12 December 2010 Marcella Zemanek, whose husband Stan died in 2007 from brain cancer, says she is in the middle of 12 chemotherapy sessions to treat her breast...

Baby girl for radio personality Jackie O

12 December 2010 Radio host Jackie O gave birth to a baby girl in the early hours of the morning. .

Hamish Blake reveals movie plans

9 December 2010 The Hamish and Andy ‘‘what will they do next?’’ question has finally been answered, for one half of the popular duo at least. Hamish Blake...

Paul Murray heads up 6PR’s new regime

8 December 2010 Paul Murray will head up radio 6PR's talkback morning show next year, reports WA Today. .

Radio National neat fit for geek comic

8 December 2010 Julian Morrow will occupy the seat vacated by Fran Kelly at Radio National breakfast over summer and he is relishing the opportunity to ...

Howard Stern may have to take a paycut

8 December 2010 More speculatipon about Howard Stern from Reuters. Howard Stern could broadcast live on Sirius XM for the last time on December 16.
